import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useEffect } from "react"; // import Footer from './Footer' // import Navbar from './Navbar' // import RegistrationStudent from "./Images/Registration_Student.jpg"; export default function Registration_Student() { useEffect(() => { document.title = "Registration - CollegeFun"; }, []); const [student, setStudent] = useState({ fname: "", mname: "", lname: "", gender: "male", email: "", phone: "", country: "", state: "", education: "", institution: "", password: "", }); // const host = "http://localhost:5000"; // const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleClick = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(student); // API call const response = await fetch(`${host}/api/auth/student/createStudent`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(student), }); const json = await response.json(); console.log(json); if (json.success) { localStorage.setItem("Studenttoken", json.authToken); console.log("Created Acoount Successfully", "success"); } else { console.log("Please enter valid crediatials", "danger"); } }; const onChange = (e) => { setStudent({ ...student, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return ( <> {/*
